mapper.select: SELECT *,(SELECT IMG_URL FROM IMAGE WHERE IMG_NAME LIKE MEMSCH.MS_COUNTRY_NAME) IMG_URL FROM MEMSCH JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = MEMSCH.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{value}

SELECT * FROM MEMSCHATTR JOIN MEMSCHCTIY ON MEMSCHATTR.MS_CTIY_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_CTIY_SEQ JOIN MEMSCH ON MEMSCH.MS_SEQ = MEMSCHCTIY.MS_SEQ JOIN MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = MEMSCH.MEMBER_ID WHERE MEMBER.MEMBER_ID LIKE #{value} AND MEMSCH.MS_TITLE LIKE '나의 첫 미국여행기'
